intro: Oreocharis mileensis, commonly known as the Mile's oreocharis, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically display a mix of white and purple hues. It grows in moist, shaded environments, often in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
